casebody.data:
BROWNE
v.
ARTEX OIL CO. 2018-0942 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 9, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

On appellants' motion for reconsideration. Motion denied. On appellees' motion to dismiss. Motion denied.

DeGenaro, J., dissents and would grant appellants' motion for reconsideration and deny appellees' motion to dismiss.
